summary: The diff implements the requested header controls (notifications + profile) on both desktop and mobile, adds a bell-anchored notifications dropdown with comment/like/follower items and timestamps, and provides a localStorage-backed, user-scoped seeded notifications source gated by sign-in. No backend changes are evident in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Notifications UX enhancements beyond the request: unread badge count on the bell, per-item read highlighting, and “Mark all as read” control.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-34/REQ-35 require a dropdown/panel listing items and a minimal data source, but do not request unread counting, read state UI, or bulk mark-as-read behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded profile dropdown menu with navigation entries (Your Profile, Library, Upload Video, Upload Short, Settings) and a Sign Out item.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-33 only requires a profile/account control and a clear Sign In entry point when signed out; the specific additional menu structure and routes are not requested.
